title: About Us
intro: CertSync was born from the frustration of juggling countless licences, permits and tickets across multiple jobs and sites. As former trades and compliance managers, we knew there had to be a smarter way.
founderBio: Today, our mission is clear: cut the chaos of credential compliance so nothing slips through the cracks. Whether you're a solo contractor or a national enterprise, CertSync gives you the clarity and control you need to stay compliant.
